text: Walter Casson (22 January 1895 – 1965) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward. ==References== Category:1895 births Category:1965 deaths Category:People from Blyth, Northumberland Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Blyth Spartans A.F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C.
